**Government Tender Announcement**

**Project Title/Title Français:** 
Request for Abbreviated Proposals (RFAP) for Inspection, Testing and Minor Repair of Fire Systems
Demande de propositions abrégées (DPA) pour l'inspection, le tests et réparations mineures des systèmes incendie

**Project No.:**
WESFLS23

**Publication Date/Date de Publication:**
2022-11-09

**Tender Closing Date/Appel d'Offres Date Cloture:**
2022-12-20T14:00:00

**Regions of Opportunity/Régions de l'Opportunité:** 
Manitoba
Saskatchewan

**Description/Appel d'Offres Description:**
Defence Construction Canada is seeking Abbreviated Proposals from consulting firms for the provision of Inspection, Testing, and Minor Repair (ITM) services for Fire Detection and Suppression Systems at the locations of Dundurn, Shilo, and Winnipeg.

**ITM Services:** 
The successful firm will be required to provide "as and when required" services for the inspection, testing, and minor repair of Fire Detection and Suppression Systems. The firm will be expected to establish three separate Service Contracts with Defence Construction Canada, one for each region.

**Contract Duration/Durée du Contrat:**
The contract will be for a period of three years, with the possibility of extension for up to two additional three-year periods.

**Regions of Delivery/Régions de Livraison:**
Manitoba
Saskatchewan

**Regions of Opportunity/Régions de l'Opportunité:**
Manitoba
Saskatchewan

**Security Requirements/Exigences de Sécurité:**
Please refer to the RFAP documents for further details on the security requirements for this project.

**Selection Criteria/Criteres de sélection:**
The successful firm will be selected based on the following criteria:
 
* Experience in providing Inspection, Testing, and Minor Repair services for Fire Detection and Suppression Systems
* Ability to meet the security requirements of the project
* Provide services at the required level of quality
* Demonstrate understanding of the project requirements and scope
